parameters.name: back_lines
parameters.description: The number of logs that you want to obtain and are generated before the generation time of the start log. Valid values: `(0,100]`.

parameters.name: forward_lines
parameters.description: The number of logs that you want to obtain and are generated after the generation time of the start log. Valid values: `(0,100]`.

parameters.name: pack_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the log group to which the start log belongs.

parameters.name: pack_meta
parameters.description: The unique context identifier of the start log in the log group.
